properties.areaDesc: Croatan and Roanoke Sounds; Alligator River; Albemarle Sound
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 2:32PM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS AND DANGEROUS SEAS TONIGHT INTO SUNDAY...

.Southerly winds 15 to 25 knots late today, will increase to 20
to 30 knots tonight and early Sunday. A brief period of gale force
wind gusts will be possible across the outer central waters as
winds peak late tonight into Sunday morning. Seas will build to 5
to 9 feet this evening and peak at 8 to 12 feet late tonight and
early Sunday. Winds will gradually diminish late Sunday and Sunday
night, but elevated seas will linger across the waters into early
next week.

* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
rough waters expected.

* WHERE...Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds and the
Alligator River.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
